mapper.select: SELECT C.* FROM(SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CARD_NO DESC) AS CARD_NO, CARD_CMP_NO, DECODE(CARD_TYPE, 0, '신용카드','체크카드') AS CARD_TYPE, CARD_NAME, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY CARD_CMP_NO ORDER BY CARD_NO DESC) AS RNK FROM CARDS ORDER BY CARD_NO ASC) C WHERE C.CARD_CMP_NO = ${cmpNo} AND C.RNK BETWEEN #{startCnt} AND #{endCnt}
